description: I play it every weekend, it's great and the simulation is realistic.
summary: A nice game for everyone who loves space

description: Calm, silent, you will find action if you want it but there is no back story that forces it on you. Want to be a pirate, be a pirate, otherwise trade and explore.
summary: Does what it says on the tin

description: I gave this game more than one chance because I love Elite/Rogue like games, but being forced to restart completely for the fourth(!) time with a game that takes endless hours is asking too much. My complaints: 1) The packager just doesn't care, the update before last the game didn't even start and now you're presented with a giant red error when you start the game. 2) Lots of updates break save games, meaning you lose weeks or even months of game play and have start from the beginning all over again. This is a nice game but the disruptive development and packaging process means you'll never be able to make real progress as a player. I've literally wasted hundreds of hours on this game and have zero to show for it.
summary: Bad packaging, save games break almost every update

description: Очень сложное управление. Так и не понял как летать.
